title: Gazetteer
description: Cutting-edge mapping application designed with a mobile-first approach.

modalContent.title: Gazetteer 🌍
content: Created as part of my IT Career Switch traineeship, Gazetteer is a cutting-edge mapping application designed with a 'mobile-first' approach.
Built on a robust stack of modern web technologies, it provides real-time profiling for countries around the world, offering demographic, climatic, and various other types of data.
Ideal for researchers, travelers, and geography enthusiasts.
features: Real-Time Map Updates 🌍: The app continuously updates maps to provide the latest information.

title: Company Directory
description: 🌐 Company personnel databases, illustrating organizational hierarchies, employee reporting lines, and locations.

modalContent.title: Company Directory 📁
content: Created as part of my IT Career Switch traineeship, this web application 🌐 efficiently manages company personnel databases, illustrating organizational hierarchies, employee reporting lines, and locations.
It’s responsive across desktop 💻 and mobile 📱 platforms.
features: Add, Edit, and Delete Personnel Records 💼: Users can effortlessly manage employee information, keeping the database up-to-date and accurate.
View Personnel by Department and Location 🗃️: Offers a structured view of employees, sorted by their department and workplace, enhancing organizational oversight.
Search Personnel Records 🔍: A powerful search feature that allows quick retrieval of specific employee details.

title: Tech Blog
description: Explore my Tech Blog, a comprehensive platform dedicated to sharing knowledge and insights on technology and programming. This full-stack application 🌐 showcases:

modalContent.title: NodeJS Tech Blog
content: Explore my Tech Blog, a comprehensive platform dedicated to sharing knowledge and insights on technology and programming. This full-stack application 🌐 showcases:
NodeJS and Express Backend 🚀: Powering the server-side with efficiency and scalability to handle dynamic content and user interactions.
MongoDB Database Integration 🗄️: Utilizing MongoDB for robust and flexible data storage and retrieval, facilitating efficient content management.
AWS Deployment ☁️: Hosted on AWS EC2, ensuring reliable and scalable cloud-based service.
User Authentication 🔐: Secure login and registration system, enabling users to contribute through comments and interactions.
Email Form with Nodemailer ✉️: Integrated contact form for direct user communication, leveraging Nodemailer for email services.

title: FoxTech IT Helpdesk
description: Explore my Next.js IT Helpdesk, a next-generation IT Helpdesk built with Next.js, Tailwind CSS, and Supabase. This project provides a streamlined and intuitive interface for managing support tickets, full authentication setup, ticket creation, deletion, ticket prioritization, with email sign up and verification.

modalContent.title: Next.js Helpdesk
content: Explore my Next.js IT Helpdesk, a next-generation IT Helpdesk built with Next.js, Tailwind CSS, and Supabase. This project provides a streamlined and intuitive interface for managing support tickets, full authentication setup, ticket creation, deletion, ticket prioritization, with email sign up and verification.
Features:
Ticket Management: Create, track, and resolve tickets efficiently with categories, priorities, and assigned agents.
User Portal: Users can submit tickets, track their status, and access knowledge base articles through a dedicated portal.

title: Netflix Clone
description: This project is a clone of the Netflix landing page, designed to demonstrate proficiency in front-end development using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Key features include:

modalContent.title: Netflix Landing Page Clone
content: This project is a clone of the Netflix landing page, designed to demonstrate proficiency in front-end development using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Key features include:
Responsive Design: Adapts seamlessly to different screen sizes, providing an optimal viewing experience.
Interactive Tabs: JavaScript-driven tabs for easy navigation through content.
Modern CSS Techniques: Utilization of Grid and Flexbox for layout, along with overlays and shadows for aesthetics.

title: Match Predictor
description: Delve into the Football Match Prediction Website, a specialized web application designed for football (soccer) enthusiasts eager to predict match outcomes. This innovative platform 🌐 is equipped with:

modalContent.title: Football Match Predictor ⚽
content: Delve into the Football Match Prediction Website, a specialized web application designed for football (soccer) enthusiasts eager to predict match outcomes. This innovative platform 🌐 is equipped with:

Dynamic Match Input Generation 🔄: Set the stage for your predictions by specifying the number of matches. The app intelligently generates corresponding input fields, offering a tailored forecasting experience.

Team Data Fetching 📊: Gain a competitive edge with up-to-date SQL database. The app fetches key team data such as strength, average goals scored, and conceded, all sourced reliably from a PHP backend.
